about_the_game:
This demo comes with all features and majority of content, with a few exceptions:

-Runs end in 1920 (giving perhaps a couple of hours or more playtime per run)
-Only one playable character
-less variety of locations to discvoer
-less variety of people to meet
-Only the first 5 upgrades are available
-Main quests are not included

name: Artist Life Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This demo comes with all features and majority of content, mostly limited by a playtime per run.
